text: HD 218619 is a giant star located in the constellation Sculptor at 685.22 light years away. It has a spectral type of K2III which gives it the orange- red colour. It has a apparent and absolute magnitude of 5.88 and -0.73 and so the star is visible to the naked eye. It has a radial velocity of -13.80000 km/s. == References == Category:Stars
title: HD 218619
